SEARCH
Package org.uma.evolver.parameter.catalogue.crossoverparameter

Class PermutationCrossoverParameter

java.lang.Object
org.uma.evolver.parameter.Parameter<String>
org.uma.evolver.parameter.type.CategoricalParameter
org.uma.evolver.parameter.catalogue.crossoverparameter.CrossoverParameter<org.uma.jmetal.solution.permutationsolution.PermutationSolution<Integer>>
org.uma.evolver.parameter.catalogue.crossoverparameter.PermutationCrossoverParameter
public class PermutationCrossoverParameter extends CrossoverParameter<org.uma.jmetal.solution.permutationsolution.PermutationSolution<Integer>>
Parameter class representing the configuration and factory for crossover operators for PermutationSolution in evolutionary algorithms.

This class allows the selection and configuration of a specific crossover operator (such as PMX, CX, OXD, Position-Based, or Edge Recombination) for permutation-coded solutions. It retrieves the required parameters (e.g., probability) from its global sub-parameters and produces a configured CrossoverOperator instance accordingly.

Supported crossover operators:

  • PMX (Partially Mapped Crossover): requires a probability.
  • CX (Cycle Crossover): requires a probability.
  • OXD (Order Crossover - Davis): requires a probability.
  • positionBased (Position-Based Crossover): requires a probability.
  • edgeRecombination (Edge Recombination Crossover): requires a probability.

Example usage: 

 PermutationCrossoverParameter crossoverParameter = new PermutationCrossoverParameter(List.of("PMX", "CX", "OXD", "positionBased", "edgeRecombination"));
 // Configure sub-parameters as needed...
 CrossoverOperator<PermutationSolution<Integer>> operator = crossoverParameter.getCrossover();
